name: Damnatus (cosmic3d, Pau)
description:
"It's time for you to remember why you ended up locked here with me."

The main mechanic of the game is a bow with arrows that you can stick into the wall and use as platforms to climb.

A platform game where you can shoot your own platforms.


 

Garrett, a prisoner who does not remember the reason for which he was condemned, embarks on an adventure to find freedom after his cell explodes, letting him escape.

 Along the way you will find unparalleled aberrations and challenges worthy of a great archer.

Damnatus is a game about loneliness and grief. Try to remember who you are while playing through its hostile levels and solving its challenging puzzles.

  • Move   -   A and D
  • Jump   -   Space
  • Aim   -   Left Click
  • Reload/Interact  -   Right Click
  • Menu  -   Backspace/Escape

  • Windows: You only need to execute the .exe file to play. Antivirus might say something about the binary.
  • Linux: You may have to use the command "chmod u+x damnatus.AppImage" or something similar to give permissions to the file and then run it.
  • MacOS: You may have to use the command "chmod u+x damnatus" or something similar to give permissions to the file. Unzip the zip, go to "Contents/MacOS" and execute the binary "Damnatus".
